title: The Photographer's Field Guide - The Essential Handbook for Trav
description:
<a href="http://imageshack.us/a/img802/55/xfcl.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://imageshack.us/a/img802/55/xfcl.jpg</a>

The Photographer's Field Guide - The Essential Handbook for Travelling with Your Digital SLR Camera[Team Nanban](pimprg)

Michael Freeman | PDF + EPUB | ISBN: 1905814739 | 2009 | 192 pages | 9 + 37 MB


DESCRIPTION:

More and more people are travelling with their cameras in the hope of taking striking photos that capture the essence of their time away - and an ever increasing number of talented amateurs are uploading their images to picture agencies and earning extra income from selling rights. 
Shooting on the road, though, does present a myriad of challenges - from erratic power supplies, to difficult customs posts, so its important to be well-prepared and ready for anything. 
The Photographers Field Guide will help you decide what to pack, and what difficulties to plan for; invaluable advice, hard-earned by Michael Freeman during his long career in photography in the field. Once youre on location, the book will enable you to quickly evaluate your surroundings, decide what opportunities exist - and make the most of them with that definitive shot. 
Stunningly illustrated throughout, this is an essential book for the travelling photographer.
